unnormalised: Arre yaar, I was trying to buy a saree for my mom from Myntra during the Diwali sale, and the payment failed 3 times! First, I used my SBI debit card, and it showed "Transaction declined" with ₹5,500 being the amount. Then I tried using UPI, Google Pay to be exact, and that also gave me an error. Finally, I used net banking, and it went through, but not before costing me extra ₹20 for the transaction fee. What a hassle to spend just ₹5.5k!
normalised: Arre yaar, I was trying to buy a saree for my mom from Myntra during the Diwali sale, and the payment failed three times! First, I used my S-B-I debit card, and it showed "Transaction declined" with rupee five thousand five hundred being the amount. Then I tried using U-P-I, Google Pay to be exact, and that also gave me an error. Finally, I used net banking, and it went through, but not before costing me extra rupee twenty for the transaction fee. What a hassle to spend just rupee five point five thousand!
